title: What ever came of the case of the manager who was found dead at the Bennagin\'s restaurant on College and New Centre where the Verizon store is now?
text:
Apparently no one was ever arrested in that case. Here's a link to a
recent blog entry from Jeffrey Scott Levy's brother:
http://levycrosscountrybicycletour.blogspot.com/2011/10/message-from-my-brother-jeffrey-scott.html



I'll pass this information along one of our public safety reporters
to consider for a cold case story.
